mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Vox Saltator: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "Americana: The Siree Peaks", "Some Older and Traditional Square Dance Movements", "More About Contras", "What's Being Danced?", and "What's On Your Mind". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Square Dance Picture", "Ladies on the Square: The Masculine Accent", "What They Are Wearing", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Jim Pearson", "Paging the Roundancers: Paul & Edna Tinsley", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
